## ğŸš€ å®‰è£… CLIProxyAPI

### ä¸€é”®å®‰è£…

```bash
curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/brokechubb/cliproxyapi-installer/refs/heads/master/cliproxyapi-installer | bash
```

### å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡

```bash
cd /root/cliproxyapi
nohup ./cli-proxy-api > cli-proxy.log 2>&1 &
```

### åœæ­¢æœåŠ¡

```bash
pkill -9 -f cli-proxy-api
# æˆ–
fuser -k 8317/tcp
```

### æŸ¥çœ‹æ—¥å¿—

```bash
cat /root/cliproxyapi/cli-proxy.log
```

## âš™ï¸ é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶

é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ï¼š`/root/cliproxyapi/config.yaml`

### å½“å‰é…ç½®

```yaml
host: ""
port: 8317

tls:
  enable: false
  cert: ""
  key: ""

remote-management:
  allow-remote: false
  secret-key: ""
  disable-control-panel: false
  panel-github-repository: "https://github.com/router-for-me/Cli-Proxy-API-Management-Center"

auth-dir: "~/.cli-proxy-api"

api-keys:
  - "sk-HKOMVOeMZZaxdaHm6NKCVmIjCGFwPsRwY0ngjah0RUoIZ"
  - "sk-MvWp8Nqi9DufkPJiIAkySc5HmdusQevypSvnnXbiSj6BU"

debug: false
commercial-mode: false
logging-to-file: false
logs-max-total-size-mb: 0
usage-statistics-enabled: false
proxy-url: ""
force-model-prefix: false
request-retry: 3
max-retry-interval: 30

quota-exceeded:
  switch-project: true
  switch-preview-model: true

routing:
  strategy: "round-robin"

ws-auth: false

# Gemini API
gemini-api-key:
  - api-key: "AIzaSyBF-PrMDYbmel-rDsZPMNd131W0GxzkctQ"

# Claude API - åä»£1 (8045)
claude-api-key:
  - api-key: "sk-9be8a847902e40789fe400f7ef9657db"
    base-url: "http://144.24.204.194:8045"
  - api-key: "test"
    base-url: "http://144.24.204.194:8484"

# OpenAI å…¼å®¹ - åä»£1 (8045)
openai-compatibility:
  - name: "antigravity-8045"
    base-url: "http://144.24.204.194:8045/v1"
    api-key-entries:
      - api-key: "sk-9be8a847902e40789fe400f7ef9657db"
  - name: "antigravity-8484"
    base-url: "http://144.24.204.194:8484/v1"
    api-key-entries:
      - api-key: "test"
```
